name: Ecommerce Wireframe Kit
description:
Quickly design e-commerce stores that convert. 

Built with best practices from Figma. 

Easily change colors and fonts in the Styles page to instantly set your desired style across all layouts and components.


Ecommerce Wireframe Kit includes:

  • Responsive Components
  • Wireframe Layouts
  • Smart + Auto Layout
  • Free Updates
  • Easy to Use and Change UI Kit
  • Customizable Style Guide


Waverly Lab is a UI/UX design agency in NYC that utilizes a data-driven process to create customer experiences that produce results
